name: octocats.be
tagline: Info on official and non-official Github events in Belgium
body:
![Belgian Octocats](http://i.snag.gy/I33Mo.jpg) # Non-official Belgian Github events page On this page one can find all info on official and non-official Github events in Belgium. The idea is that everyone can and will submit any information regarding Github events in Belgium on this page, and people can subscribe to the repository to get the latest updates. ## Upcoming events - None atm :( - feel free to organize one! - ## Past events

Join us October 4 for a drinkup in Ghent, Belgium! https://t.co/nySfnp0ymi

— GitHub (@github) September 27, 2013
### How to update? One can edit the source for this Markdown file online using [this link](http://todo.com): click edit, and submit the pull request when you are done. Having trouble with updating the Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact tom@corebvba.be and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
